citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Upon inspection, one vial of “Humulin N” insulin was still being utilized beyond the recommended packaging timeframe
and confirmed by the facility representative present that the medication was still being given to animals on-hand. The
instructions on the box denote that any unused portion remaining 31 days after first opening should be discarded. The
open vial identified was opened on August 6, 2023, and still being administered to two diabetic primates.
Medications may lose their strength and may no longer be effective as indicated for their use when used outside of the
designated time table identified by the manufacturer. Additionally, the effect of the medications may be unpredictable,
potentially leading to further illness when used beyond the intended time outlined on the label. The facility must ensure
the availability of appropriate facilities, personnel, equipment, and services to comply with the provisions of this
subchapter.
The facility corrected during the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with authorized person.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Upon inspection, one vial of “Humulin N” insulin was still being utilized beyond the recommended packaging timeframe 
and confirmed by the facility representative present that the medication was still being given to animals on-hand. The 
instructions on the box denote that any unused portion remaining 31 days after first opening should be discarded. The 
open vial identified was opened on August 6, 2023, and still being administered to two diabetic primates. 
Medications may lose their strength and may no longer be effective as indicated for their use when used outside of the 
designated time table identified by the manufacturer. Additionally, the effect of the medications may be unpredictable, 
potentially leading to further illness when used beyond the intended time outlined on the label. The facility must ensure 
the availability of appropriate facilities, personnel, equipment, and services to comply with the provisions of this 
subchapter. 
The facility corrected during the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with authorized person.
